document.full_text: tens of thousands of greeks vented their anger at the nation's political classes in athens on sunday, staging the biggest in a week of protests as the government seeks backing for yet more austerity.
document.title: greeks vent anger at entire political class
lines_and_colors: tens of thousands of greeks vented their anger at the nation's political classes in athens on sunday, staging the biggest in a week of protests as the government seeks backing for yet more austerity.
